content:
**materials ** size 20 crochet thread j & p coats or clark s brands recommended each large motif requires about 25 yards and each fill-in motif about 5 yards allow for extra thread for edging milward s steel crochet hook no 8
an updated version of this pattern was later published as a bedspread in *spool cotton co #85* bedspreads as queen anne s lace bedspread #642 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/queen-annes-lace-bedspread-642
